description:
Not only is it disingenuous for the left to call Kilmar Abrego Garcia is nothing more than an innocent father, but it’s also wrong to claim he lacked due process. This is why it’s incredibly foolish and misleading for Governor JB Pritzker to retaliate against El Salvador “for aiding his unconstitutional deportation scheme.”

Don't you wish Pritzker fought for Americans the way he fights for foreign nationals accused of awful crimes?

The US Constitution guarantees due process.

Donald Trump is eroding it in real time – we must fight back to restore the balance of power.

Today, I’m announcing a series of measures against El Salvador for aiding his unconstitutional de
title: Democrat 2028 hopeful goes all in on illegal immigrants with new measures against El Salvador for helping Donald Trump

description:
A new Idaho law banned unauthorized flags on public property. However, Boise Mayor Lauren McLean does not care about the state law and is proudly waving a pride flag at City Hall.

SOURCE: https://t.co/HfjwKZ9KJc
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) April 25, 2025

title: Woke Idaho mayor flies gay pride battle flag, defies law that only normal flags be flown over government buildings
